body.name: Mouthwash, 30 Packets Travel Mouth Wash for Adults, Travel Size Mouthwash Alcohol Free, Mini Mouthwash for Travel Essential, TSA Approved Mouthwash Bulk Pocket Size On The Go,Mint,11ml/0.37FL.OZ Each
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Portable Travel Mouthwash】30 packets of travel size mouthwash for 1 month's supply, $0.30 each for stress-free use. Individually packet design instead of travel bottles, no need for a cup, just tear open, convenient to travel and did not add any weight to your travel bag.

【Long-lasting Fresh Breath】Upgraded with a stronger mint flavor and fresh breath last more than 8 hours. Instantly freshens breath and reduces embarrassment after using your favorite strong-flavored foods, traveling, camping. Or place in guest rooms or hotel bathrooms to make guests feel at home, offering a convenient bulk mouthwash option for medical facilities, etc.

【Strong Cleaning Power】The mouth wash for adults can deeply clean the gap between the teeth, dissolve tooth stains, soften and peel off tartar, and protect the oral environment 360°. Easily eliminates bad breath without any strong irritation, perfect for after meals, business, traveling, or social dating.

【100% Alcohol Free】Travel mouthwash is formulated with natural ingredients and is super gentle. No alcohol and gluten will not irritate mouth ulcer patients. Free from artificial dyes, colors, or harsh ingredients that can cause staining, gently cleansing the mouth and maintaining fresh breath.

【Airline Approval】TSA-Approved pocket-sized travel mouthwash easily fits in your purse or pocket. Clever and sturdy packages are leak resistant as well as easy to tear and open whenever you need to, whether you’re using them in an airport or anywhere else.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable Strip Mouthwash TSA-approved travel mouthwash packets are easy for traveling and good for a quick breath refresher. Individual mini mouthwash packet size is easy to use or keep in a purse. Each packet comes with the perfect amount for one use, take as many as you need. No need to carry an open leaking bottle or guess how much is enough for a trip. It even comes in a storage box so they aren't all over the place.

100% Natural Ingredients No alcohol and gluten will not irritate mouth ulcer patients. Upgraded with a stronger mint flavor without burning and fresh breath lasts more than 8 hours. Free from artificial dyes, colors, or harsh ingredients that can cause staining. Eliminating your coffee breath fast and gently after drinking.

Easy to Tear Open No need for a cup, just tear open and the fluid comes out easily, empty it into your mouth, swish and toss! It's easier than carrying around a bottle of mouthwash. The mouthwash packets are easy to tear open without using scissors and don't leak during travel. You can fresh breath in an airport or anywhere else.

Wide Range of Uses Instantly freshens breath and reduces embarrassment after using your favorite strong-flavored foods.Refresh your breath on traveling, business trips, or camping. Place in guest rooms or hotel bathrooms to make guests feel at home.Offering a convenient bulk mouthwash option for medical facilities, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for keeping in your luggage or to go bag!
reviews.reviewText: This travel mouthwash in a 30-pack of individually wrapped strips is a convenient and compact solution for on-the-go oral hygiene. What sets these strips apart is their alcohol-free formula, ensuring a gentle and non-drying experience for your mouth. The mild flavor is a bonus, making it a more palatable option for those who prefer a less intense taste. The individual packaging adds to the portability and allows you to carry them with ease, whether you're traveling or simply need a quick refresh on the run. Overall, these travel mouthwash strips are a handy addition to your travel essentials, ensuring fresh breath and oral hygiene without the inconvenience of carrying bulky bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for traveling
reviews.reviewText: The package mouthwash is really convenient for travel , especially you don't want to brush you teeth on the flight. It's also good to keep some in your office.I wish it could be a little more "spicy" , probably I got used to the traditional mouthwash.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Travel-friendly mouth wash
reviews.reviewText: These travel-sized mouthwash packets are conveniently pocket-sized, making them perfect for travel. I stay fresh and confident in some of the busy trips. A must-have for frequent travelers!
